Review_title: Such an honest insight to the creation and validation of music...
Review_Text: I loved this. I love Bastille and I truly enjoyed the insights shared about the mental acuity and tenacity it takes to simply be able to do what you love. The criticism of art has gotten out of hand and talent is curbed because of it. Dan Smith is a genius, in my opinion, and the heart and soul poured into this is really a fruit of his leadership.
Great band. Their authenticity shines through. Great group of guys and so talented. ðŸ’•
